unitree_legged_sdk.example_py.old_examples.move_limb_neurons_discrete¶

unitree_legged_sdk.example_py.old_examples.move_limb_neurons_discrete.jointLinearInterpolation(initPos, targetPos, rate)[source]¶
unitree_legged_sdk.example_py.old_examples.move_limb_neurons_discrete.theta_calf(x, y, z, L=0.213)[source]¶

Calculate the calf angle θ_calf.

Parameters: x (float): The x-coordinate. y (float): The y-coordinate. z (float): The z-coordinate. L (float): The length parameter, default is 0.213.

Returns: float: The calf angle θ_calf in radians.

unitree_legged_sdk.example_py.old_examples.move_limb_neurons_discrete.theta_hip(z, y)[source]¶

Calculate the hip angle θ_hip.

Parameters: z (float): The z-coordinate. y (float): The y-coordinate.

Returns: float: The hip angle θ_hip in radians.

unitree_legged_sdk.example_py.old_examples.move_limb_neurons_discrete.theta_thigh(x, y, z, L=0.213)[source]¶

Calculate the thigh angle θ_thigh.

Parameters: x (float): The x-coordinate. y (float): The y-coordinate. z (float): The z-coordinate. L (float): The length parameter, default is 0.213.

Returns: float: The thigh angle θ_thigh in radians.
